label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"鸡中暑","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡中暑是由于天气炎热，气温高，湿度大，饲养管理不善造成的。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":73,"end":76,"text":"鸡中暑","labels":["disease"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"汗腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡本身汗腺不发达，散热主要靠张口急促呼吸，张翅炸毛，大量饮水和排泄来调节体温，如密度大、通风不良，不能及时采取有效的降低环境温度的措施，则容易发生鸡中暑。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"张口急促呼吸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"张翅炸毛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"食欲大减","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"饮欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"昏迷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"站立不起","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":50,"text":"虚脱而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":18,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡表现精神不振，张口急促呼吸，张翅炸毛，食欲大减，饮欲增加，逐渐出现昏迷，站立不起，常因虚脱而死亡。

label: [{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":30,"text":"采取有效的降温措施","labels":["control"]}]
text: 为了使鸡安全度过酷暑季节，应加强饲养管理，采取有效的降温措施。

label: [{"start":1,"end":5,"text":"打开门窗","labels":["control"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"安装风扇","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"泼洒凉水","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"保证饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"搭设棚","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"避免阳光直射","labels":["control"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"及时清除粪便","labels":["control"]},{"start":46,"end":52,"text":"供饮绿豆汤水","labels":["control"]},{"start":53,"end":62,"text":"在饮水中加入十滴水","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":62,"text":"十滴水","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 如打开门窗，安装风扇，泼洒凉水，保证饮水，搭设棚，避免阳光直射，及时清除粪便，有条件的鸡场可供饮绿豆汤水或在饮水中加入十滴水0.5毫升。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"减食增饮","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"给予优质饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":35,"text":"个别病鸡可单独管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 因此时减食增饮，所以为了保证营养，应给予优质饲料。对个别病鸡可单独管理。
